msbt.message: Year of the Mouse! Yes! Nothing's gonna stop me this year. I'm gonna be the biggest mouse there is!
It's the Year of the Ox! My year, at last! Time to pull out all the stops. Twenty-four-pack, here I come!
Year of the Tiger! Alright, time for the Tiger of to show everyone how it's done!
The Year of the Rabbit is here! Time to get hoppin'! I'm gonna take my triple jump to the next level!
Year of the Horse, here we go! Think I'm gonna relax just 'cause it's my year?<10_4 /> Neigh!
It's the Year of the Sheep, not the Year of the Sheepish. Time to show off those quads, !
It's the Year of the Monkey! Gonna drill down on some swing exercises. Bring it and swing it, !
The Year of the Bird, at last! Time to put these wings to work! My delts are gonna get so ripped!
Year of the Dog! My year is here! I'm gonna do a few zoomies around the island. You want in, ?
All set to wallow in the Year of the Pig, ? Time for some tail curls!
